name: Tentatron
description:
Stuck in a lab past closing time, you find a gun that has a monster inside. The monster seems to have... mutated to work with the gun. Unfortunately for you, the monster seems to be everywhere else as well.

This game was made in under 48 hours for the Discord Game Jam, and is extremely broken. So broken that it's mostly just a tach demo, but I hope you enjoy nonetheless...
